data.name: Dwarf
data.description:
The Alliance - Dwarf [W]
Units:
+2 armor
-5% attack rate

Buildings:
+10% hit points
Barracks attacks bounce once (35% dmg loss)

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Magic:
Ironskin (+4 armor to friendly unit)
Thunder Wave (Deals 90 dmg in a line)
Repair (Instantly heals one unit for 200 HP)

Traits: What they lack in magic and spells, Dwarves make it up in their ingenuity. Weak starting units, but powerful late game mechanical contraptions that are resistant to almost all magic effects.

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Reconstruction Aura
auras.description:
+1 HP/s building regeneration
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: True Aim Aura
auras.description:
+20% ranged unit and structure damage
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Blessing Aura
auras.description:
Gives your Heroes special Auras
(Muradin gains +4 HP/sec Arcane Aura)
(Brann gains +10% AS Haste Aura)
(Bor and Thordin gain +8 armor Devotion Aura)

Unique Aura

bonuses.name: Runed Armor [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Shredder Rounds

Reduces spell damage to Zealot, Rifleman, Battle Priest and Steam Tank by 20%, increases their hit points by 25 and armor by 2.

Type: Anti Magic / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Mechanised Division [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Flaming Rounds

Assault Buggy replaces Rifleman
Ranged Unit (Mechanical)
+10% attack rate
+75 HP
Abilities:
Gatling Gun (Passive Skill)
(+70% attack rate after a kill)
Shredder Rounds (Passive Skill)
(20% for 30 damage, 0.6s stun)
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Mithril Armor
Flaming Rounds
Advanced Guns
Composite Armor
Repair Bots

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Combat Engineers [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Magic Training

Engineer replaces Battle Priest
Spellcaster
+5% attack rate
+50 HP
+75 MP
Abilities:
Purge (Disable Spell)
(dispels buffs, slows for 5/6/7/8s)
Sentry Gun (Sumonning Spell)
(summons 1 turret for 45 second)
Upgrades used:
Combat Magic (Upgrades Abilities)
Mithril Armor
Magic Training

Type: Anti Buff / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Siege Engines [D]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Composite Armor

Siege Engine replaces Steam Tank
Siege Unit
+150 HP
+3 armor
Abilities:
Final Job (Passive Spell)
(45 dmg in 300 AoE on death)
Bash (Passive Spell)
(25% for 30 dmg, 1.5 sec stun)
(does not affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Mithril Armor
Missile Launchers
Composite Armor
Repair Bots

Type: Mid Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

bonuses.description:

+225 HP

(15% chance to deal 60 damage in 125 AoE)

(restores 60 HP to 3 units)

bonuses.name: Explosive Barrel [W]
bonuses.description:
Increases Steam Tank, Gyrocopter and Mortar Buggy attack rate by 7% and gives 15/20/25% chance to spawn Mine Trap on attack, which deals 16/24/32 dmg in 200 AoE
(upgrades together with Grand Hall)

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Dwarven Pride [C]
bonuses.description:
The mastery of Dwarven smithing is unmatched!

Type: Unique Bonus

upgrades.name: Mastering the Art
upgrades.description: Increases the power of Runes forged, both Regular and Great ones

towerUpgrades.name: Shredder Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage
Affects: Mortar Buggy and Cannon Turret

Lv1: 15% for 2.5x damage
Lv2: 30% for 2.5x damage
Lv3: 45% for 2.5x damage
Lv4: 60% for 2.5x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Shield of Unification
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: block ability, bonus regeneration
Affects: Zealot

Lv1: 10% chance, +2 HP/s
Lv2: 20% chance, +4 HP/s
Lv3: 30% chance, +6 HP/s
Lv4: 40% chance, +8 HP/s

towerUpgrades.name: Flaming Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces target's armor
Affects: Rifleman and Gyrocopter
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: -3 armor for 10 seconds
Lv2: -6 armor for 12 seconds
Lv3: -9 armor for 14 seconds
Lv4: -12 armor for 16 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Advanced Guns
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus dmg and attack rate
Affects: Rifleman, Gyrocopter and Mortar Buggy

Lv1: +4/8/12 dmg, +5% attack rate
Lv2: +8/16/24 dmg, +10% attack rate
Lv3: +12/24/36 dmg, +15% attack rate
Lv4: +16/32/48 dmg, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Missile Launchers
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals 40 damage per missile
Affects: Steam Tank and Gyrocopter
(deals 50% damage to buildings)

Lv1: launches 1 missile every 6 seconds
Lv2: launches 2 missiles every 6 seconds
Lv3: launches 3 missiles every 6 seconds
Lv4: launches 4 missiles every 6 seconds

spells.name: Missile Launchers
spells.description: Fires down streams of flame, lighting nearby enemies on fire.

spells.name: Missile Launchers
spells.description: Fires down streams of flame, lighting nearby enemies on fire.

towerUpgrades.name: Composite Armor
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus HP and armor
Affects: All mechanical units

Lv1: +2 armor, +50 HP
Lv2: +4 armor, +100 HP
Lv3: +6 armor, +150 HP
Lv4: +8 armor, +200 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Mortar Barrage
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage
Affects: Mortar Buggy

Lv1: 100 damage in 125 AoE
Lv2: 200 damage in 150 AoE
Lv3: 300 damage in 175 AoE
Lv4: 400 damage in 200 AoE

spells.name: Mortar Barrage - [Level 1]
spells.description: Deals 100 damage to enemy land units.

towerUpgrades.name: Magic Training
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: magic empowerment
Affects: Battle Priest
(Empowers: Ironskin,Thunder Wave,Repair)

Lv1: +1 armor and +1 HP/s, +15 dmg, +25 HP heal
Lv2: +2 armor and +2 HP/s, +30 dmg, +50 HP heal
Lv3: +3 armor and +3 HP/s, +45 dmg, +75 HP heal
Lv4: +4 armor and +4 HP/s, +60 dmg, +100 HP heal

towerUpgrades.name: Repair Bots
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: health regeneration
Affects: All mechanical units

Lv1: regenerates 2.5 HP/s
Lv2: regenerates 5 HP/s
Lv3: regenerates 7.5 HP/s
Lv4: regenerates 10 HP/s

t1spell.name: Cannon Barrage [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoF.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Rocket Barrage [X]
t2spell.description:
Sends rockets in all directions.
Each rocket deals 700 damage.
Repeats after 3 seconds delay but with 50% damage
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

fort.description:
Gives:
Can train Special Unit
+5500 Grand Hall hit points
+200 Grand Hall mana
+4 Grand Hall armor

skills.name: Cannon Barrage [Z]
skills.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoF.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

skills.name: Rocket Barrage [X]
skills.description:
Sends rockets in all directions.
Each rocket deals 700 damage.
Repeats after 3 seconds delay but with 50% damage
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: Repair (Lv1) [Q]
skills.description:
Restores 100 HP over 15 seconds.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: Anti-Hero Sentry (Lv1)
skills.description: Attacks do 2x damage to Heroes.

skills.name: Anti-Hero Sentry (Lv1)
skills.description: Attacks do 2x damage to Heroes.

skills.name: Shredder Rounds (Lv1)
skills.description: 15% to do 2.5x damage

heroes.name: Dwarven Avatar
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Thunder Clap (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 10-22% slow
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Thunder Hammer (Passive Skill)
13-19% for 4s stun
(has half duration on Heroes)

Thunder Wave (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4s stun
(45 second cooldown)

Avatar (Self Spell)
250-1750 HP, 40% spell damage reduction, 5 armor
(lasts 30s, has 90s cooldown)

skills.name: Thunder Clap - [Level 4]
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing <AHtc,DataA4> damage to nearby enemy land units and slowing their movement by <AHtc,DataC4,%>% and attack rate by <AHtc,DataD4,%>%.

skills.name: Thunder Wave - [Level 1]
skills.description: Sends a wave of force out in a straight line, dealing 250 damage and stunning enemy units for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Activate Avatar - [Level 1]
skills.description:
Activate Avatar to have 250 bonus hit points, 10% bonus attack rate and 5 bonus armor.
Lasts 30 seconds.

heroes.name: Adventurer
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Overload (Support Spell)
15-27% attack rate bonus
(affects mechanical units only)
(60 second cooldown)

Sentry Gun (Summoning Spell)
summons 3 immobile unit
(25 second cooldown)

Blinding Shot (Disable Spell)
reduces dmg and AS by 12-24%,
burns 10 MP/sec, for 12-24s
(half duration on Special Units)
(affects Hero units only)

Repair (Healing Spell)
500-800 HP to 3-9 units
(affects mechanical units only)
(30 second cooldown)

skills.name: Overload - [Level 1]
skills.description: Increases attack rate of mechanical units by 15%.

skills.name: Sentry Gun - [Level 4]
skills.description: Summons 1 Sentry Gun.

skills.name: Repair - [Level 4]
skills.description: Heals up to 4 mechanical units for 300 hit points.

heroes.name: Siege Team
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Demolisher

Can learn:
Napalm Round (Damage Spell)
10-22 damage/sec, -4 armor
(affects buildings only)
(60 second cooldown)

Homemade Bombs (Orb Effect)
15-27% for 150 area damage
(350 area of effect)

Demolition Aura (Disable Aura)
1-7 building armor reduction

Cannonball Rain (Damage Spell)
300-600 damage in 600 AoE
(60 second cooldown)

skills.name: Blizzard - [Level 4]
skills.description: Calls down 1 freezing ice shard wave; each wave deals <AHbz,DataB4> damage to units in an area.

skills.name: Napalm Round - [Level 1]
skills.description: Reduces buildings armor by 4 and deals 10 damage per second for 30 seconds.

heroes.name: Siege Fortress
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Shot Gun (Orb Effect)
15-27% for 200 area damage
(350 area of effect)

Electroshock (Damage Spell)
200-350 damage, 20-32% slow 6-12 sec
(350-500 area of effect)
(45 second cooldown)

Composite Armor (Passive Skill)
12-30% to block an attack

Rockect Pods (Passive Skill)
launches 1-7 rockets to target
(200 dmg each rocket)

skills.name: Electroshock - [Level 4]
skills.description: Deals 275 damage and slows by 26% for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Rocket Pods - [Level 1]
skills.description: Launches a missiles at nearby enemies.
